alert.note: Alert for Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued April 29 at 2:08PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...A High Surf Advisory remains in effect... WHAT...High surf of 10 to 12 feet WHERE...all shores of all islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Wednesday IMPACTS...Minor. Expect some strong breaking waves, shorebreak, and strong longshore and rip currents making water recreation difficult and dangerous. Some coastal erosion is also possible for vulnerable locations. Larger set waves may occasionally impact harbor entrances. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 208 AOAULI ASO TOANA`I APERILA 29 2023 ...O loo faaauau le Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... MAFUAAGA...Galu maualuluga e 10 i le 12 futu NOFOAGA...Talafatai o motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Lulu AAFIAGA...Feololo. E ono malolosi ma maualuluga galu fafati fa`apea aave o le sami, e faigata ma le saogalemu mo ni gaioiga i le sami. E ono tutupu fo`i lologa ma sologa i itu-matafaga. O galu tetele ma maualuluga fo`i e ono aafia ai gutu o uafu. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O tagata uma o lo`o i matafaga fa`apea le `au fai faiva, ia usita`ia fautuaga mo lou saogalemu.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Rose Atoll; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
